# Missions targets ## Elimination
Eliminate large and dangerous creature - [color=#a4885c]ascended cultist[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
## Destruction
Destroy a certain amount of [color=#a4885c]blood collectors[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
